docs.title: WELCOME TO FUROBOT
docs.text: FURobot is a free robot simulation software for architects，It supports multiple brands of bots and custom bots，isGrasshopperPlugins for。

docs.title: TUTORIAL
docs.text:
1. Installation
  2. Quick Start
  3. Coordinate System
  4. Custom tool head 1
  5. Custom tool head 2
  6. Custom Robot
  7. Use external axis
  8. Lock joint
  9. Custom External Axis
  10. Motion planning
  11. UseAPI

docs.title: CUSTOM TOOL HEAD 1
docs.text: Learn more about customizing the tool header

docs.title: USEAPI
docs.text: This tutorial uses an example of the transition between Euler angles and Rigidbody transforms，demonstrates how to callFURobotofAPIFunction

docs.title: CUSTOM EXTERNAL AXIS
docs.text: This tutorial demonstrates how to customize aXYZType of external axis

docs.title: CUSTOM BOTS
docs.text: This tutorial demonstrates how to build a two link robotic arm from scratch，and do motion simulations.

docs.title: CUSTOM TOOL HEAD 2
docs.text: explained in detail： 1. How to Get Rigidbody Transforms for Tool Heads 2. How to set up toolheads for multiple materials

docs.title: COORDINATE SYSTEM
docs.text: This tutorial isKUKAExamples of robots，explained the root coordinate system，Flange coordinate system，Concept of tool end coordinate system and target plane coordinate system

docs.title: QUICK START
docs.text: This tutorial demonstrates how to generate a simple motion trajectory from scratch

docs.title: INSTALLATION
docs.text: Demonstrates how to install and register FURobot

docs.title: LOCK JOINT
docs.text: This tutorial demonstrates how to lock a joint，Joints include external axial joints and the robot's own joints

docs.title: MOTION PLANNING
docs.text: This tutorial demonstrates how to avoid obstacles through exercise planning

docs.title: USE EXTERNAL AXIS
docs.text: This tutorial demonstrates how to use the monorail outer shaft

docs.title: 欢迎来到 FURobot
docs.text: FURobot 是一个免费的面向建筑师的机器人仿真软件，它支持多种品牌的机器人和自定义机器人，是一个Grasshopper的插件。

docs.title: 教程
docs.text:
1. 安装
  2. 快速入门
  3. 坐标系
  4. 自定义工具头 1
  5. 自定义工具头 2
  6. 自定义机械臂
  7. 使用外部轴
  8. 锁定关节
  9. 自定义外部轴
  10. 运动规划
  11. 使用API

docs.title: 自定义工具头 1
docs.text: 详细讲解了如何自定义工具头

docs.title: 使用API
docs.text: 本教程通过一个欧拉角和刚体变换之间的转换例子，演示了如何调用FURobot的API函数

docs.title: 自定义外部轴
docs.text: 本教程演示了如何自定义一个XYZ类型的外部轴

docs.title: 自定义机器人
docs.text: 本教程演示了如何从零开始搭建一个二连杆机械臂，并进行运动仿真

docs.title: 自定义工具头 2
docs.text: 详细讲解了： 1. 如何获得工具头的刚体变换 2. 如何设置多种材质的工具头

docs.title: 坐标系
docs.text: 本教程以KUKA机器人为例，解释了根坐标系，法兰坐标系，工具端坐标系和目标平面坐标系的概念

docs.title: 快速入门
docs.text: 本教程演示了如何从零开始生成一段简单的运动轨迹

docs.title: 安装
docs.text: 演示了如何安装与注册 FURobot

docs.title: 锁定关节
docs.text: 本教程演示了如何锁定关节，关节包括了外部轴关节和机器人自身的关节

docs.title: 运动规划
docs.text: 本教程演示了如何通过运动规划来避障

docs.title: 使用外部轴
docs.text: 本教程演示了如何使用单轨道外部轴
